dct_alternative_sm: Topography and geology Three Star area Camulos quadrangle
dct_description_sm: by G. Draper, Stanford Geological Survey, C.F. Tolman Jr., Director.
Triangulation by C.A. Dobbel and J.D. McPherson; topography and geology by H.M. Van Clief, W.D. Pheney, and Guy Draper.
Includes section and primary triangulation diagram -- Scale: 1" = 9000."
Field notebooks on "Field geology notebooks, 1921 field season, Camulos quadrangle" record.
Dobbel1-3 triangulation notebooks on "Field map, topography, Camulos quadrangle" record.
McPherson1-2 triangulation notebooks on "Geologic folio of a portion of the Pleasanton quadrangle" record.
No. 1-3 consist of ms. map, uncolored map on traceable paper, Van Dyck negative, and hand col. blue line print.
